num_of_sensors = 5

#this constant comes from the sensor technical specifications
signal_scaling = 15.625

#this is specific to the ICS values in nA/ppm
ics_unit_scaling = 0.000000001

#Sensors
sensor_1 = CO
sensor_2 = SO2
sensor_3 = H2S
sensor_4 = O3
sensor_5 = NO2

#Cross-sensitivity matrix
cs_1 = 1, 0.05, 0.04, 0.2, 0.1
cs_2 = 0.0182, 1, 5.692, 0.66, 0.14
cs_3 = 0.027, 0.085, 1, -0.18, -0.2
cs_4 = 0.0001, 0, -0.5, 1, 0
cs_5 = 0.0002, 0.005, -0.232, -0.1, 1

#Resistance in Oms
R_1 = 100000
R_2 = 100000
R_3 = 50000
R_4 = 500000
R_5 = 500000

#Temperature Coefficient of Span (interpolated as a polynomial)
TCS_1 = 0.8762, 0.0073, -7E-05
TCS_2 = 0.7897, 0.0107, -7E-05
TCS_3 = 0.9442, 0.0037, -5E-05
TCS_4 = 0.9126, 0.0031, 2E-05, -3E-07
TCS_5 = 0.9126, 0.0031, 2E-05, -3E-07

#Zero Shift (interpolated as a polynomial)
ZS_1 = -0.0749, -0.0529, 0.0033, 0.0002
ZS_2 = 0.2359, 0.0012, 0.0025, 9E-05
ZS_3 = 0.0994, 0.0046, -8E-05, -2E-06, 6E-08
ZS_4 = -0.0006, -0.0006, -3E-06, 2E-06
ZS_5 = -0.0006, -0.0006, -3E-06, 2E-06

#Inverse working matrix
invA_1 = 1.0139882028395224, 0.08964295848053214, 0.45683100197856996, 0.1774741494013618, 0.022582634075512757
invA_2 = 0.38143286596564824, 2.090601734719087, 12.736618497303786, -0.6148579944066024, -2.21649617000352
invA_3 = 0.06795015897255328, 0.20378420969517258, 2.383453306193714, -0.23679739932312766, -0.4413658559841633
invA_4 = -0.03387368066599268, -0.10188314055173822, -1.191680969996659, 1.118416447076504, 0.2206851862554892
invA_5 = -0.010267106844636947, -0.026618685328814676, -0.3700186113503612, -0.05994344320683751, 1.0692503956395745
